name: engineer
description: uses math and science to solve different technical problems.

name: plumber
description: maintain the flow and drainage of water, air, and other gases by assembling, installing, and repairing pipes, fittings, and plumbing fixtures districtwide

name: architect
description: create designs for new construction projects, alterations and redevelopments.

name: interior designer
description: make indoor spaces functional, safe, and beautiful by determining space requirements and selecting essential and decorative items, such as colors, lighting, and materials.
